calculated.description: Whether the column has a formula set on it.

defaultValue.description: Default value formula for the column.

display.description: Whether the column is the display column.

timeFormat.description: A format string using Moment syntax: https://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/

isArray.description: Whether or not this column is an array.

A time unit used as part of a duration value.

display.description: How an email address should be displayed in the user interface.

force.description: Force embeds to render on the client instead of the server (for sites that require user login).

format.description: How the numeric value should be formatted (with or without symbol, negative numbers in parens).

isArray.description: Whether or not this column is an array.

allOf.description: A number or a string representing a formula that evaluates to a number.

oneOf.description: A formula that evaluates to a numeric value.

style.description: How an image should be displayed.

allOf.description: A number or a string representing a formula that evaluates to a number.

oneOf.description: A formula that evaluates to a numeric value.
Format of an image reference column.

isArray.description: Whether or not this column is an array.

useThousandsSeparator.description: Whether to use a thousands separator (like ",") to format the numeric value.

isArray.description: Whether or not this column is an array.

allOf.description: Reference to the table this column refers to, if applicable.
Reference to a table or view.

oneOf.description: Format of a column that refers to another table.

isArray.description: Whether or not this column is an array.

options.description: For select format columns, the list of available options. Only returned for select lists that used a fixed set of options. Returns the first 5000 options.

items.description: An option for a select column.

backgroundColor.description: The background color of the option.

foregroundColor.description: The foreground color of the option.

maximum.description: The maximum number allowed for this scale.

displayType.description: How the slider should be rendered.

allOf.description: The maximum allowed value for this slider.
